## Vectors in R

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow", TRUE)

class(marmots)
```

### Create a numeric vector:

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.9, 5)

#NOTE - check class to ensure that the right type of value is being used

class(pika)
```

```{r}
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L)
```
